pages.text: Getting started, you'll notice that you won't be able to punch trees. What you'll need to do is gather the small pebbles and sticks around the world (TIP: you can right-click them to gather more quickly).$(br)$(br)Once you have two or more pebbles, put one in your main and one in your off-hand and hold down right-click to knap!

Sometimes this process doesn't work but usually you'll successfully create Flint, which you'll need to make a flint hatchet.$(br)$(br)You can use the hatchet to strip logs, and then craft 1 plank from 1 stripped log. Once you have 4, make yourself a crafting table and a Flint Saw to more efficiently create planks from logs. From there, you have a choice for your first set of tools.

pages.title: Your Starting Axe
pages.text: This little guy isn't very helpful in the long-term, but for those first few pieces of wood nothing else will cut it!

pages.title: Right Tool for the Job
pages.text: This saw will save you SO much time - there are also different tiers! Iron, Gold, Diamond, Netherite, Copper, Bronze and Steel are all great alternatives!
